subject: Basketball
College Athletics
Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Women)
lead_paragraph: Tiffany Hayes, a senior guard, had 22 points and 8 rebounds as the Huskies defeated Kentucky to reach the N.C.A.A. semifinals for the fifth consecutive year.
snippet: Tiffany Hayes, a senior guard, had 22 points and 8 rebounds as the Huskies defeated Kentucky to reach the N.C.A.A. semifinals for the fifth consecutive year.
